body:
New to SPACK, just tried installing on my Mac and get a problem with gnuplot and fails on the pango package.  Couldn't easily find anything with google.
```
$ spack install gnuplot
...
==> Installing pango
==> Using cached archive: /Users/zukaitis/spack/var/spack/cache/pango/pango-1.41.0.tar.xz
==> Staging archive: /Users/zukaitis/spack/var/spack/stage/pango-1.41.0-ixmiyl2qtc5pbbh52mxwsh6zbd7k6xoa/pango-1.41.0.tar.xz
==> Created stage in /Users/zukaitis/spack/var/spack/stage/pango-1.41.0-ixmiyl2qtc5pbbh52mxwsh6zbd7k6xoa
==> No patches needed for pango
==> Building pango [AutotoolsPackage]
==> Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> Executing phase: 'configure'
==> Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j8'

4 errors found in build log:
     [ ... ]
     194       import copy as _copy
     195     File "/Users/zukaitis/spack/opt/spack/darwin-elcapitan-x86_64/clang-8.0.0-apple/python-2.7.14-kwvfv6h3xgxwpmpteiygy4iqo5jadzwc/lib/python2.7/copy.py", line 52, in <module>
     196       import weakref
     197     File "/Users/zukaitis/spack/opt/spack/darwin-elcapitan-x86_64/clang-8.0.0-apple/python-2.7.14-kwvfv6h3xgxwpmpteiygy4iqo5jadzwc/lib/python2.7/weakref.py", line 14, in <module>
     198       from _weakref import (
     199   ImportError: cannot import name _remove_dead_weakref
  >> 200   make[2]: *** [s-enum-types-c] Error 1
     201   make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
     202   Traceback (most recent call last):
     203     File "/Users/zukaitis/spack/opt/spack/darwin-elcapitan-x86_64/clang-8.0.0-apple/glib-2.55.1-a7tnppl2qqdgh7nucknlzuap5bov7byq/bin/glib-mkenums", line 12, in <module>
     204       import argparse
     205     File "/Users/zukaitis/spack/opt/spack/darwin-elcapitan-x86_64/clang-8.0.0-apple/python-2.7.14-kwvfv6h3xgxwpmpteiygy4iqo5jadzwc/lib/python2.7/argparse.py", line 86, in <module>
     206       import copy as _copy
     207     File "/Users/zukaitis/spack/opt/spack/darwin-elcapitan-x86_64/clang-8.0.0-apple/python-2.7.14-kwvfv6h3xgxwpmpteiygy4iqo5jadzwc/lib/python2.7/copy.py", line 52, in <module>
     208       import weakref
     209     File "/Users/zukaitis/spack/opt/spack/darwin-elcapitan-x86_64/clang-8.0.0-apple/python-2.7.14-kwvfv6h3xgxwpmpteiygy4iqo5jadzwc/lib/python2.7/weakref.py", line 14, in <module>
     210       from _weakref import (
     211   ImportError: cannot import name _remove_dead_weakref
  >> 212   make[2]: *** [s-enum-types-h] Error 1
  >> 213   make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
  >> 214   make: *** [all] Error 2
```
title: Pango install fails on macOS with Clang
